name: Float
description: Comprehensive Float API integration for resource management, project scheduling, time tracking, and team management. Supports people, projects, tasks/allocations, time off, logged time, clients, departments, and roles.

api_key.label: Float API Key
api_key.help_text: Your Float API key can be accessed at https://{your-company-name}.float.com/admin/api (Account Settings > Integrations)

application_name.label: Application Name
application_name.help_text: The name of your application or integration (e.g., 'Acme Corp Float Integration')

contact_email.label: Contact Email
contact_email.help_text: Your contact email address for Float API support (required by Float API)

list_people.description: List all people/team members in Float with optional filtering and pagination

active.description: Filter by active status (true for active only, false for inactive only)

modified_since.description: Only return people modified since this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

per_page.description: Number of results per page (default: 50, max: 200)

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return

sort.description: Field to sort by (prefix with '-' for descending, e.g., '-name')

get_person.description: Get details of a specific person by ID

people_id.description: The ID of the person to retrieve

expand.description: Comma-separated list of related resources to expand (e.g., 'contracts')

create_person.description: Create a new person/team member in Float

active.description: Whether the person is active (1 = active, 0 = inactive, default: 1)

people_id.description: The ID of the person to update

active.description: Whether the person is active (1 = active, 0 = inactive)

effective_date.description: Effective date for rate changes (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

expand.description: Comma-separated list of related resources to expand in response

people_id.description: The ID of the person to delete

list_projects.description: List all projects with optional filtering and pagination

modified_since.description: Only return projects modified since this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

get_project.description: Get details of a specific project by ID

project_id.description: The ID of the project to retrieve

create_project.description: Create a new project in Float

project_code.description: Unique project code for external systems (max 32 characters)

project_team.description: Array of people IDs for project team

budget_type.description: Budget type (0 = none, 1 = total, 2 = per phase)

active.description: Whether project is active (1 = active, 0 = inactive)

project_id.description: The ID of the project to update
The ID of the project to delete

list_tasks.description: List all tasks/allocations with optional filtering and pagination

modified_since.description: Only return tasks modified since this date

get_task.description: Get details of a specific task/allocation by ID

task_id.description: The ID of the task to retrieve

create_task.description: Create a new task/allocation in Float

task_id.description: The ID of the task to update
The ID of the task to delete

list_time_off.description: List all time off entries with optional filtering

timeoff_type_id.description: Filter by time off type ID

get_time_off.description: Get details of a specific time off entry

timeoff_id.description: The ID of the time off entry

create_time_off.description: Create a new time off entry

full_day.description: Whether this is a full day time off

update_time_off.description: Update an existing time off entry

timeoff_id.description: The ID of the time off entry to update
The ID of the time off entry to delete

list_logged_time.description: List all logged time entries with optional filtering

get_logged_time.description: Get details of a specific logged time entry

logged_time_id.description: The ID of the logged time entry (hexadecimal)

create_logged_time.description: Create a new logged time entry

update_logged_time.description: Update an existing logged time entry

logged_time_id.description: The ID of the logged time entry to update
The ID of the logged time entry to delete

list_clients.description: List all clients with optional filtering

modified_since.description: Only return clients modified since this date

get_client.description: Get details of a specific client

active.description: Whether client is active (1 = active, 0 = inactive)

client_id.description: The ID of the client to update
The ID of the client to delete

get_department.description: Get details of a specific department

get_role.description: Get details of a specific role

output_schema.description: Array of time off type objects

get_time_off_type.description: Get details of a specific time off type

timeoff_type_id.description: The ID of the time off type

get_account.description: Get details of a specific account

get_status.description: Get details of a specific status

get_public_holiday.description: Get details of a specific public holiday

public_holiday_id.description: The ID of the public holiday

get_team_holiday.description: Get details of a specific team holiday

holiday_id.description: The ID of the team holiday

get_project_stage.description: Get details of a specific project stage

project_stage_id.description: The ID of the project stage

get_project_expense.description: Get details of a specific project expense

project_expense_id.description: The ID of the project expense

get_phase.description: Get details of a specific phase

list_project_tasks.description: List all project tasks (default task names)

get_project_task.description: Get details of a specific project task

project_task_id.description: The ID of the project task

merge_project_tasks.description: Merge multiple project tasks into one

source_ids.description: Array of source project task IDs to merge

target_id.description: Target project task ID to merge into

get_milestone.description: Get details of a specific milestone

get_people_report.description: Generate a people report with optional filtering

get_projects_report.description: Generate a projects report with optional filtering
